channel.title: Mods and admin can kick and ban me? o.O (im owner of server)
channel.description: i have an server but my friends are admin and 1 is mod and they can kick me! and admin can ban me! how do i change that?

item.title: Mods and admin can kick and ban me? o.O (im owner of server)
item.dc:creator: @superxero superxero
item.description:
@superxero wrote:

Try going into the client.java.
Search for “ban”.
Then when you find the correct ban, Make the player rights 3.
To make it to where u can ban them but they no ban you, make sure in ure character.cfg or w/e, that ure file is playerrights=3.
This will allow only you to ban, no-one else.
I cant think of a command to make you unbannable only, sorry.

Read full topic
item.source: Mods and admin can kick and ban me? o.O (im owner of server)

item.title: Mods and admin can kick and ban me? o.O (im owner of server)
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

In your kicking/banning commands, simply make it check what they entered, and if it doesn’t equal your accounts name, to continue appending the ban/kick.
